es.usal.bicoverlapper.kernel.configuration
Class DiagramConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  es.usal.bicoverlapper.kernel.configuration.DiagramConfiguration

public class DiagramConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Class for the Configuration of a Window containing a Diagram. This configuration is mainly used to change colors of the different objects in the diagrams (axes, points, labels, etc). This includes: position of the window in the desktop, dimension of the window, name used as title for the window and identifier of the kind of diagram in this window

Author:
Javier Molpeceres

Builds a window configuration.

Parameters:
id - Identifier of the kind of diagram to which this ConfigurationWindow refers
name - Name (title) of the window
posX - X coordinate of the top-left point of the window
posY - Y coordinate of the top-left point of the window
dim - Dimension of the window
